summary: Economic fragmentation and AI-bio expansion alongside widening conflict zones and climate damage.

events.details: US strikes ISIS in Puntland kill 46 fighters.
Tariff delay after Ontario threatens to end Starlink contracts.
Israeli operations in Jenin and other cities push Palestinian death toll to 70 for the year.
Severe storms trigger landslides and mudslides, prompting $2.3M in emergency grants.
Manas AI founded; Nvidia and Innophore unveil CavitOmiX for drug discovery.
NASA completes final pre-vacuum tests ahead of spacecraft integration for the Europa mission.
US signals intent to activate global tariff package after 30-day pause expires.
Regulators approve a next-generation malaria vaccine for African rollouts.
